title: The New Zealanders
brief_description: Life in New Zealand. Countryside, cities and typical homes; transport; the Maoris; parliament; schools; child care; free health and educational services; agriculture as the mainstay of the economy; the state of secondary industry; hydro-electric and geothermal power; maintaining standards in primary products for export; the arts, sports and recreations; thermal regions; a Maori pah.
